name: Space Shooter [OLD]
description:
OBSOLETE GAME FROM 2017

This is a simple game of Asteroids on Atari 2600 or Arcade Machines. Just with few things added and changed.

1.6.2

  • Ending Improved

1.6.1 Release

  • The game is easier
    -Hitbox is fixed
    -Boss is easier

1.6 Release

  • The end to the game
  • Final boss (needs 500 shoots to kill)
  • 100 rounds until end

1.5 Release

  • Graphics Update!
  • Backround Update!
  • 2 bugs fixed
  • A suprise at the 125th round

1.4 Release

  • Achievements added!
  • 8 Achievements available (for now)
  • 1 bug fixed, leaving no bugs at all!
  • Achievement menu
  • The more rounds you beat the more difficult it gets (adding more rocks)
  • When you die, rocks speed doesn't reset, but it slows them 80% instead of 100% which makes the game harder but easier to get score.

1.3 Release

  • Main menu added
  • You can look controls on the control menu
  • You can exit the game "in the game"
  • When you collect a life, the power up sound plays
  • While you play, you can go back to the main menu by simply pressing "ESC"
  • If you want to get out of the control menu, press "ESC"
  • While making this, i fixed few bugs
  • New Restart look

1.2 Release

  • New look for the player
  • Pause option (Press "P")
  • First collectables added, lives.
  • 1 Bug fixed
  • New Music
  • Controls in the pause menu

1.1.1 Release

-2 bugs fixed (getting stuck by a medium meteroid and teleport fix)

1.1 Release

  • New & Better Font
  • Space Music
  • 1 bug fixed (when you shoot a meteroid close, the parts randomly teleports)
  • Round Counter
  • Better Score System
  • Difficulty Increases the more you play
